info.item3:
I am a UI/UX designer with 3 years of industry experience and a background in Business Administration. This combination allows me to focus on integrating user experience with business value in my designs. I believe design is not just about aesthetics but also a way to solve problems, enhancing product usability and creating more value for businesses.

My background enables me to approach design from the perspective of market needs and user behavior, crafting digital products that balance functionality and appeal. Additionally, I excel at coordinating with various stakeholders in projects to ensure aligned goals and outcomes that meet market demands.

In my free time, I enjoy visiting coffee shops and attending exhibitions. These hobbies sharpen my observational skills and attention to detail, qualities that I incorporate into my design work to better meet user needs and create delightful experiences.

value.V1-1: As a UI/UX designer, I believe empathy and considering others' perspectives help us better understand how to collaborate with different types of people. I maintain an open mindset to communicate and exchange ideas with team members, allowing us to progress continuously together.
value.V2-1: As a designer, I am passionate about learning, constantly refining my professional skills, and acquiring new knowledge to meet ever-changing design demands. When facing challenges, I focus on deep understanding and providing innovative solutions.
value.V3-1: I believe that good work efficiency enhances effectiveness and drives the progress of the entire workflow. I strive to excel professionally and improve efficiency in my work, contributing to the overall value creation of the team.
